title: Healing Incense Aura
content:
a Level 10 Cleric. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.

Healing Incense Aura Information

Emanate a soothing aura. You and nearby allies regain 1~4 hit points at the start of your turn.

Type: Class Actions 10 Turns Range: 9m Long Rest

How to Unlock Healing Incense Aura

Healing Incense Aura can be unlocked by:

Devotee's Mace: A Cleri
